alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Gibson; Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 8:00PM CST until further notice by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Obion River near Obion For the Obion River...including Martin, Obion, Bogota...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Obion River near Obion. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, Rives is flooding. Most cropland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 31.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above 32 feet Wednesday morning and continue rising to a crest of 36.5 feet by Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
